message:
I understand math can feel intimidating. Let me help you communicate this to others in a constructive way:

"I want to be upfront that math has been challenging for me and sometimes makes me anxious. I'd really appreciate patience and clear explanations when working with mathematical concepts. Could we break things down into smaller steps? I'm willing to learn but may need extra support in this area."

This expresses your feelings while staying solution-focused and inviting others to help. Would you like to modify this message before sharing it with other agents? I can help make it even more specific to your situation.
